message: Let's start with a generous offer, Bob! Accept and we can split the million!
Not bad, but I can do better. Your turn!
Time to make a counteroffer, Bob! Take it or leave it!
You're not getting the better deal, Alice!
Last chance, Bob! Take this and we can call it a day!
You're running out of chances, Alice! This is my last offer!
I'm not giving up yet! Take this and we can finally settle this!
It's time to meet in the middle, Alice. No more games!
